General.Name: Westwater Resources Inc
General.Description: Westwater Resources, Inc., an energy technology company, focuses on developing battery-grade natural graphite materials in the United States. It primarily holds interests in the Kellyton Graphite plant located near Kellyton, Alabama; and the Coosa Graphite project covering an area of approximately 41,965 acres situated in east-central Alabama, near the western end of Coosa County. The company was formerly known as Uranium Resources, Inc. and changed its name to Westwater Resources, Inc. in August 2017. Westwater Resources, Inc. was incorporated in 1977 and is headquartered in Centennial, Colorado.
General.Address: 6950 South Potomac Street, Centennial, CO, United States, 80112
